title: Man shot in Metairie early Wednesday morning
content:
METAIRIE, LA (WVUE) -
A man was shot in the leg early Wednesday morning in Metairie.
The incident occurred in the 900 block of Zinnia Avenue, near West Metairie Blvd. and Transcontinental Drive. When police arrived on the scene, the man who is thought to be the shooter was standing nearby.
The victim was rushed to a nearby hospital. No information was available on his condition.
Jefferson Parish Sheriff’s Investigators say they are uncertain about the circumstances led up to the shooting, but they are questioning an individual they believe may be the shooter.
